description: This table contains the coding-related error history for external system errors.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COD_ERROR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Lists the type of error for each error that occurred for the hospital account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


External System Error


Coding Validation Error


Coding Validation Warning

columns.name: ERROR_START_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Lists the UTC instant for when each error first appeared for the hospital account.

columns.name: ERROR_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Lists the UTC instant for when each error was resolved for the hospital account.

columns.name: EXT_ERROR_CODE
columns.description: Lists the external error code for each external error that occurred for the hospital account.

columns.name: ERROR_IS_ACTIVE_YN
columns.description:
Lists whether or not each error is currently applicable for the hospital account. If the error is not active then there will also be an end time for the error.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: ERROR_MESSAGE
columns.description: Lists the error message for each error that occurred for the hospital account.
